title: Software
description: A software used for computational  analysis. For example, Bowtie2 alignment software.

name.title: Name
name.description: Unique name of the software package; a lowercase version of the title.

title.title: Title
title.description: The preferred viewable name of the software.

source_url.description: An external resource to the codebase.

used_by.title: Used by
used_by.description: The component(s) of the IGVF consortium that utilize this software.

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: The general categories of this software.
categories.comment: The specified category should indicate what this software is primarily used for.

items.title: Category
items.description: The main category describing the primary use of this software.

enum_descriptions.CRISPR Screens: Software used for designing or analyzing CRISPR-based functional screens.
enum_descriptions.General Bioinformatic Utilities: Software used in general bioinformatic tasks for the manipulation of files and sequences.
enum_descriptions.Genomic Annotations: Software used for scoring or collating information to annotate genomic elements or variants.
enum_descriptions.Networks: Software used for analyzing or reconstructing regulatory networks
enum_descriptions.Predictions: Software used for predicting or prioritizing genetic variants on functional effects, pathogenicity or clinical impacts.
enum_descriptions.Reporter Assays: Software used for designing or analyzing reporter assays such as STARR-seq or MPRA.
enum_descriptions.Single Cell Multiome: Software used for analyzing single cell or nuclei experiments such as RNA-seq or ATAC-seq.
